title: Are 80% of all diseases transmitted by hand? Nigerian doctor's claim is misleading
subtitle: We fact-check Aproko Doctor’s tweet to his more than 500,000 followers.
author: africacheck.org

While promoting a new brand of hand sanitiser,

Fidelis Egemba, known as Aproko Doctor on Twitter, told his 500,000 followers that “over 80% of all diseases in the world are transmitted by hands”.

Egemba told Africa Check he meant infectious diseases only. However, a number of experts said there was no evidence that supported such a share, whether of infectious or non-infectious diseases.

We rate the claim as misleading.
